title: Funky lamb shish kebabs
ingredients: ['2 red onions', '1 fresh Leutschauer paprika pepper', '1 sweet red pepper', '10 mushrooms', '1 dessertspoon olive oil', '450g (1 lb) good quality lean diced lamb', '2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', '2 cloves garlic, chopped', '1 dessertspoon ground fresh mint', '1 tablespoon honey']
